Self.Wiki: This map object represents a pseudo-multiplayer ceremony event.

HostEntityID.Wiki: The entity ID of the non-player character whose world the player enters.

EventFlagID.Wiki: The event flag set when the player is within the region.

ActivateGoodsID.Wiki: [Unused] The item that is used to trigger the pseudo-multiplayer event.

InvasionPointEntityID.Wiki: The entity ID of the invasion point.

NetworkMsgNpcType.Wiki: NPC type to use as field in NetworkMsgParam (1-21)

EventTextForMapID.Wiki: The map ID for event text.

CeremonyParamID.Wiki: A reference to a row in CeremonyParam.

RoleParamIDOverride.Wiki: ID of a row in RoleParam that overrides default role.
